threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: @alt_right, u r so clueless. war profiteers r the real winners here. ur ignorance is astounding. energy prices rise bc of greedy corps, not wars. focus on the real issue: capitalism.                                         #
